name: Kevin the Unicorn
description:
Pitch : 

Unicorn Kevin, wants glitter in his life. For that, he will have to bring his vocal cords and sing on passers-by to have money. His goal in life is to shoot himself, but not without difficulty as Kevin must try to escape the police and the pound that is against the glitter. His dream being the "ultimate high", Kevin must get a max of drug to be able to glide until the end of his life.

Credits :

Game Programming : Darius CARBONNIER-POURRE & Karim AL-HOMSI

Game Art : Eva SILVA

Game Design : Anton PHILIPPE

C&D - Ingame : David JANEIRO

C&D - Artworks : Virabo HOY & Tiffany SONG

C&D - Identité Jeu : Lucas GAUMON

C&D - Communication : Damien DA FONTE MARIN & Chloé FERON

C&D - IHM : Martin LIGONESCHE &Matteo GONZALEZ

C&D - UI : Josua-Gabriel DE ASSUNCAO GOMES
